channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache ShenYu Admin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache ShenYu Admin

item.title: CVE-2021-37580|2024-08-04T01:23:01.186Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20shenyu%20admin
item.description: A flaw was found in Apache ShenYu Admin. The incorrect use of JWT in ShenyuAdminBootstrap allows an attacker to bypass authentication. This issue affected Apache ShenYu 2.3.0 and 2.4.0
